body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories               Stories             Book of Mormon John and John Quincy Adams weren't the only family members who loved collecting books.  John Quincy's son Charles Francis also had an extensive collection of books from all across the world.  Perhaps one of the most exciting is a Book of Mormon signed by Joseph Smith!  Click on the link to learn more.
title: Adams National Historical Park: Stories
